item.title: Woofstock 2023 tickets available now!
item.description: Join us on July 29th, 2023 at American Legion Post 28 - Get tickets here! Please join Best Friends Animal Rescue (BFAR) in July 2023 for our 1st annual Woofstock charity event! We’re excited to spend a fantastic evening filled with music, vendors, and food. Plus, your pups are invited to join us! We’ll be hosting silent and live auctions filled with...

item.title: Woofstock 2023
item.description: Join us on July 29th, 2023 at American Legion Post 28 - Tickets available now! Want to help by sponsoring or donating? Do that here Please join Best Friends Animal Rescue (BFAR) in July 2023 for our 1st annual Woofstock charity event!
